resources.string: You can activate Earthquake Alert via the following(Location) button:

There are two types of earthquakes in Indonesia based on their strength scale. If the magnitude of the earthquake is small, it may not have a large effect, but if the magnitude is large, as happened in NTB, of course that must be considered. 

Now technology is advancing and there are several information applications or preparations that have been made to anticipate events such as an earthquake. 

EarthquakeSMLiteApp is a simple application related to earthquake event preparation that implements maps as well as sensors. This application can show the location in real time, the nearest safe place, test the vibration sensor and compass.

Nearby Place: Nearby places based on user location. Available places are like parks and stadiums to find large areas and hospitals for victims.

Shake Sensor: A sensor that can detect shaking and will generate vibrations when detected.

Location Button: A button that will direct the user to location settings which provides earthquake alerts(on some devices).

Compass: Azimuth, gravity and geomagnetic sensors which detect the cardinal directions to find the correct direction.

Widget: The provided widget when clicked will direct the user to the application and open compass.
Compass widget that helps you find the right direction
